column5: TURKEY AND TRIFLE !!!!!!!            And, Ralphie's new friend all day, my sister's white Sheppard.  They had a ball all day!  Here they are sizing up the dishwasher       Hope everyone had as wonderful a supper as we had tonight.  Merry Christmas
One Xmas we made  a trifle with rumpot/rumtopf instead of the regular fruit.  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rumtopf
Glad to see you had a great time Joey! Now time to go fishing!
That trifle looks amazing!!!!! i bet you enjoyed that  S.

I thought you were referring to the huge Asian supermarket lol. That turkey looks great and the dogs look like they were scoping out leftovers  btw, that trifle looks enormous for one person or is the glass deceivingly large  ?
Sorry Joey, but my wife's turkey was better.....Yours was very good, but I gotta stand up for my wife. However the trifle, now that looked fantastic!!   :thumbsup_anim:
Hope it all tasted as good as it looks Joey.  Diane always makes trifle here for Christmas too and is consistantly one of the seasons hi-lites for me
Why do you need a dishwasher when you have two dogs in the house?
Dogs are giving the dishes a pre-wash!! Love the Trifle J!

MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM....turkey looks yummy.   LOL...i have to laugh....the pic of Ralphy in the dishwasher reminds me that i keep shutting our new puppy's head in the dishwasher...as soon as i open it...his head is in there...and i'm still not 100% used to having him around.   Q: What is over 1000 feet high?   A: The 'TRIFLE TOWER'..
Boy he,s growing fast J. Looks like you dont need a dish washer. They,ll just lick the plates clean.LOL
Thanks Joey, I just gained 3 LBS. looking at your post. Looooooooks good  and the desert,my mouth is drooling

Thanks Guys, the trifle went a long way, but sadly, had to be put to rest today, got all runny.  I'm sure I gained more than 3 lbs eating it, let alone looking at it  Yep, he's growing like a weed B.  He's a ton of fun to watch grow and learn.  Really enjoying him and can't wait to see how he grows up and for all the new things he'll see for the first time, like snow tonight
That's just great Joey    I'm glad I read through the thread cause trifle, didn't know what it was    Looks delish Sounds like you and your sister had an awesome time and your little friends
LOL, Tell Paul to put some boots on,he,ll catcha  cold.  Ralf looks awesome.  Is there another?
Not sure if there's another from the same litter, I could check tho!
